summary: Kunoichi armor for CBBE and UNP with HDT support.
descriptionHtml:
Thank you for taking time to download and trying out this mod.
Please endorse the original Nausicaa mod and this mod for an encouragement.

[heading][color=#00ffff]Requirement[/color][/heading]
[list]
[*]Original Kunoichi: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17876]Sexy Kunoichi 2nd By Nausicaa[/url]
[*]For HDT option: [list]
[*]SKSE and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996]HDT Physical Extension[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000]XP32 skeleton[/url]
[/list]
[/list][heading][color=#00ffff]Credit[/color][/heading]
Nausicaa for the original Kunoichi
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by Ousnius and Caliente[/url]
[heading][color=#00ffff]About this mod[/color][/heading]
Two install types are available:
[list=1]
[*]A replacer to the original Kunoichi: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17876]Sexy Kunoichi 2nd By Nausicaa[/url] mod that replaces the armor's CBBE body to UNP body. If you equip this armor on a non-UNP, you'll see major clipping around the body.
[*]The override option will allow this armor on any body type.  It has both CBBE and UNP, and you'll always see either CBBE or UNP.
[/list]
The HDT version has both CBBE and UNP, and I added weight slide to the CBBE armor. I had to remove the original CBBE chainmail to support the weight slide. I added the HDT CBBE chainmail that can be crafted under Steel.

The HDT version does not have the strapless bra because the HDT physic.  Nothing holding up the bra when HDT makes them bounce.  I uploaded the strapless bra option just in case some of you like to use it.

I made a youtube video showing the HDT armor on Rosa, and the 2nd half has the strapless bra option. The video is showing the following my other mods.
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53067]Refracting stalhrim mod[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29123]Refrating glass mod[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60447]Auto unequip shield when sheath mod[/url]
[/list]
[youtube]Mr0rRifmnFQ[/youtube]

I'm not as good as Nausicaa, so you'll see very tiny armor clipping on gloves and boots like when you squat to sneak.The "Kunoichi UNP BodySlide config" download has the Kunoichi_UNP BodySlide2 configuration, so you can create your own to your preference.
[heading][color=#00ffff]How to craft[/color][/heading][list]
[*]CBBE is craftable & smithing at Daedric, DragonScale, Leather.
[*]UNP is under Leather only.
[*]Chainmail is craftable at jewelry, and the HDT version of UNP and CBBE Chainmails are craftable under Steel.
[/list][heading][color=#00ffff]Install order[/color][/heading][list=1][*]Install the original [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17876]Sexy Kunoichi 2nd By Nausicaa[/url] mod first.
[*]Download this mod, and install it to Skyrim/Data directory. Overwrite the original mod 17876 with this mod.
[*]This mod includes the CBBE and UNP body texture with the "override" option.  You can replace them with your own CBBE or UNP by copying them to the "textures/nausicaa/armor/sexy kunoichi 2nd" for CBBE and to the "textures/nausicaa/armor/sexy kunoichi 2nd/unp" for UNP.
[/list][heading][color=#00ffff]Uninstall[/color][/heading]
Install the original [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17876]Sexy Kunoichi 2nd By Nausicaa[/url] mod again.
author: Skysan4298
